spec:
after logging in I can see in the browser debug tools:

auth_token	undefined	
auth_user	undefined

Update the frontend to match the API response

And update the hints md file to say that the API is always the source of truth... so never change the API to match the frontend... if you need to then change the frontend to match the API
commitMessage:
fix: update frontend auth to match API response format

- Updated AuthResponse interface to match backend API response
- Updated auth service to use access_token and user_id
- Updated auth context to use correct response fields
- Added API-first guidance to hints.md
